item.title: RMD TRY
item.description: ################################################################## ########## persiapan Data World Values Survey (WVS) ############## ##### Script ini adalah alur kerja untuk memeriksa data WVS, ##### ##### dari awal data mentah, pemilihan variabel yang relevan ##### ##### dan inspeksi data secara umum dan keseluruhan ##### ################################################################## ## 1. Setup working directonary setwd("D:/Kuliah/SEMESTER 3/MPS/WVS DATA/Journal") ## 2. Mengimpor Data library(haven) wvs.dta <- read_dta("D:/Kuliah/SEMESTER 3/MPS/WVS DATA/F00010404-WVS_Wave_7_Indonesia_Stata_v1.4/WVS_Wave_7_Indonesia_Stata_v1.4.dta") ## 3. Inspeksi Data (1) mengecek data secara keseluruhan dim(wvs.dta) ## [1] 3200 380 View(wvs.

item.title: Paper Tawang
item.description: Find Suitable Systems and Policy to Enhance Indonesia Education Quality Through Its PISA Result: Compare with Finland Education System Tawang K. Utami Universitas Negeri Yogyakarta Abstract The aim of this paper is to examine how public and international pressures affect the education policy in Indonesia. The method used in collecting data was by utilizing secondary data and compiling news from international finding. The news compilation was analyzed using discourse analysis to depict the public pressure to change the curriculum in Indonesia.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
